lessons.title: How to Build a Startup
lessons.author: Y Combinator
lessons.description: Sam Altman and the partners of YC teach you how to start a startup. This lecture covers the basics of starting a company, including the idea, team, product, and execution.

lessons.title: How to Pitch Your Startup in 3 Minutes
lessons.author: Michael Seibel
lessons.description: A great pitch is crucial for fundraising, recruiting, and more. Michael Seibel, CEO of Y Combinator, breaks down how to craft a compelling 3-minute pitch.

lessons.title: How to Get Your First 1,000 Users
lessons.author: Gustaf Alströmer
lessons.description: Getting your first users is one of the hardest parts of building a startup. Gustaf Alströmer, partner at YC, shares actionable strategies to acquire your initial user base.

lessons.title: How to Build a Great Product
lessons.author: Y Combinator
lessons.description: Learn the principles of building products that users love. This lecture covers the importance of talking to users, iterating quickly, and focusing on a core problem.

lessons.title: A Guide to Pre-seed Fundraising
lessons.author: Y Combinator
lessons.description: This lecture provides a comprehensive guide to raising a pre-seed round, including how to find investors, what to put in your deck, and how to close the deal.

lessons.title: Everything We Teach at YC in 10 Minutes
lessons.author: Y Combinator
lessons.description: A rapid-fire summary of the core concepts taught at Y Combinator, covering everything from idea to execution.

lessons.title: How to Start a Startup
lessons.author: Sam Altman, Dustin Moskovitz
lessons.description: A foundational lecture on the principles of starting a company, from two of the most influential figures in the startup world.

lessons.title: Best Startup Lessons from Y Combinator
lessons.author: Michael Seibel
lessons.description: YC's CEO Michael Seibel shares some of the most important lessons learned from working with thousands of startups.

lessons.title: Startup Business Models and Pricing
lessons.author: Startup School
lessons.description: An essential guide to creating a sustainable business model and setting the right price for your product.

lessons.title: How to Apply and Succeed at YC
lessons.author: Startup School
lessons.description: Insider tips on how to craft a successful application for Y Combinator and what to expect during the process.

lessons.title: The Sales Playbook For Founders
lessons.author: Startup School
lessons.description: A practical guide for founders on how to build a repeatable sales process from the ground up.

lessons.title: How to Get Your First Customers
lessons.author: Startup School
lessons.description: Actionable strategies for acquiring your first set of users and validating your product in the market.

lessons.title: How to Build An MVP
lessons.author: Startup School
lessons.description: Learn the principles of creating a Minimum Viable Product to test your ideas quickly and efficiently.

lessons.title: Why Should I Start a Startup?
lessons.author: Michael Seibel
lessons.description: A talk that explores the core motivations and mindset required to embark on the entrepreneurial journey.

lessons.title: Lessons from 1,000+ YC Startups
lessons.author: Dalton Caldwell
lessons.description: Insights on resilience, avoiding common pitfalls, and knowing when to pivot, drawn from a vast pool of startup experiences.

lessons.title: English for Entrepreneurs
lessons.author: Oxford Online English
lessons.description: A lesson focused on the specific English language skills needed to grow your business and communicate effectively.

lessons.title: 30 Years of Business Knowledge in 2.5 Hours
lessons.author: Valuetainment
lessons.description: A marathon session covering decades of business wisdom, condensed into a single, high-impact video.

lessons.title: The Foundations of Entrepreneurship
lessons.author: The Speaker
lessons.description: A full course on the fundamental principles of entrepreneurship, from idea generation to execution.

lessons.title: 7 Must-Know Business English Lessons
lessons.author: Go Natural English
lessons.description: Practical English lessons for real-world business scenarios, including emails, presentations, and meetings.

lessons.title: IELTS Speaking Topic: Entrepreneurship
lessons.author: IELTS English Academy
lessons.description: An English podcast designed to help you talk about entrepreneurship, perfect for IELTS preparation and general fluency.

lessons.title: Introduction to Entrepreneurship
lessons.author: Michael R. Nusbaum
lessons.description: A university-style lecture that provides a comprehensive introduction to the world of entrepreneurship.

lessons.title: How To Build A Business That Works
lessons.author: Brian Tracy
lessons.description: Legendary business coach Brian Tracy shares his formula for building a successful and sustainable business.

lessons.title: The Power of an Entrepreneurial Mindset
lessons.author: Bill Roche
lessons.description: A TEDx talk on how cultivating the right mindset can be the most critical factor in entrepreneurial success.

lessons.title: Naval Ravikant Talks Entrepreneurship
lessons.author: Naval Ravikant
lessons.description: Philosopher and investor Naval Ravikant shares his unique and profound insights on building wealth and a successful business.

lessons.title: Business English Conversation
lessons.author: Boston English
lessons.description: The first lesson in a course designed to improve your conversational skills in a professional business context.

lessons.title: How to Finally Start Your First Business
lessons.author: Ali Abdaal
lessons.description: A practical guide to overcoming procrastination and taking the first steps to launch your business in 2025.

lessons.title: 49 Powerful Lessons From Entrepreneurs
lessons.author: Chris Do
lessons.description: A compilation of priceless advice and lessons learned from dozens of successful entrepreneurs.

lessons.title: How to Write a Business Plan
lessons.author: Brian Tracy
lessons.description: An essential lesson on how to create a clear and effective business plan to guide your startup's growth.

lessons.title: Best 54 Minutes of Business Advice
lessons.author: Foundr
lessons.description: A curated collection of the best business advice from some of the world's most successful founders.

lessons.title: 6 Tips on Being a Successful Entrepreneur
lessons.author: John Mullins
lessons.description: A TED talk offering six practical and insightful tips for anyone looking to succeed in entrepreneurship.

lessons.title: 18 Minutes of the Best Entrepreneur Advice
lessons.author: Evan Carmichael
lessons.description: A fast-paced compilation of top advice to help you grow your business and mindset.

lessons.title: 50 Entrepreneurs Share Priceless Advice
lessons.author: Alex Berman
lessons.description: A massive compilation of tips and wisdom from 50 different successful entrepreneurs.

lessons.title: Best Advice to Small Business Owners
lessons.author: Forbes
lessons.description: A collection of top advice specifically tailored for small business owners from a leading business publication.

lessons.title: Simon Sinek: 5 Rules Of Success
lessons.author: Startup Stories
lessons.description: An inspirational video outlining Simon Sinek's five key rules for achieving success in business and life.

lessons.title: Steve Jobs Motivational Speech
lessons.author: Startup Stories
lessons.description: A powerful motivational speech from Steve Jobs that continues to inspire entrepreneurs around the world.

lessons.title: How to Take Criticism: Startup Edition
lessons.author: Entrepreneur
lessons.description: A lesson on how to handle feedback and criticism constructively, a crucial skill for any founder.

lessons.title: How to Pitch Investors on Your Vision
lessons.author: Entrepreneur
lessons.description: Learn from self-made startup owners as they share their secrets to pitching a compelling vision to investors.

lessons.title: How Much is Your Startup Worth?
lessons.author: Entrepreneur
lessons.description: A real-world guide to startup valuation, helping you understand how to determine your company's worth.

lessons.title: Fix My Pitch: The Secrets of a Killer Business Pitch
lessons.author: Entrepreneur
lessons.description: A practical session that breaks down a business pitch and rebuilds it to be more effective and persuasive.

lessons.title: Fix My Pitch: Nailing the 'Three P's'
lessons.author: Anthony Sullivan
lessons.description: Legendary pitchman Anthony Sullivan shares his framework for nailing the 'Three P's' of a successful pitch.

lessons.title: Fix My Pitch: Turn a Setback Into Success
lessons.author: Entrepreneur
lessons.description: Learn how to handle tough questions and turn a pitch meeting setback into a successful outcome.

lessons.title: How to Evaluate Startup Ideas
lessons.author: Kevin Hale
lessons.description: A YC partner shares a framework for evaluating startup ideas to determine if they have potential.

lessons.title: Asking 80 Year Old Millionaires If It Was Worth It
lessons.author: Noah Kagan
lessons.description: A unique video that gathers life and business wisdom from those who have achieved long-term success.

lessons.title: How To Lean On Your Best Self When Life Gets Hard
lessons.author: Dan Martell
lessons.description: Coach Dan Martell provides strategies for staying resilient and accessing your strengths during tough times.

lessons.title: The Future of Digital Marketing Will Surprise You
lessons.author: Neil Patel
lessons.description: Marketing guru Neil Patel shares his predictions for the future of digital marketing and how to stay ahead.
